pr_title: Make default operator for multi-term and phrase text search queries configurable

timeline.message:
Make default operator for multi-term and phrase text
index queries configurable

timeline.bodyText: Could you add some tests which uses OR operator? If there is some cases like that, can we add some comments on that and mention the test with AND in this test class?
timeline.author: jackjlli

replies.bodyText:
There are plenty of existing tests that use both and (explicitly) and or (both implicitly and explicitly).
In addition, I have added new tests to test the behavior when the config is set to true. In this case also, I have added tests for both and and or implicitly and explicitly
replies.author: siddharthteotia
